transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haa, hello?
Customer: Hai, daada.
Executive: Ma'am, kipparane ma'am India Mart da?
Customer: Aah, undu.
Executive: Varukalle ma'am, vilichayirunnale? Ma'am aayirunno vilichathu?
Customer: Athe.
Executive: Okay, enthu patti ma'am?
Customer: Athu ippo oru wifi-il ninnu oru enquiry vannittundayirunnu. Pakshe athinu notification...
Executive: Enquiry vannittundalle?
Customer: Aah, athu notification vannilla. Njaan just veruthe onnu eduthu check cheythappolaanu notification kaanunnathu. Chalathokke notification varunnundu, chalathu varunnilla.
Executive: Okay, nammal ippo kazhinja maasam ma'am nannaayittu use cheythittundu. So athinte basis-il namukku kazhinja maasam October maasam 222 direct enquiry namukku receive cheythittundu.
Customer: Aah.
Executive: So ee maasam namukku 57 enquiry maathrame ithuvare receive cheyyaan pattittullu. Usage ee maasam enganeyaanu ma'am use cheyyunnathu?
Customer: Vallya reethiyil use cheythilla. Verum naalu divasam maathrame nammal use cheythittullu ee maasam.
Executive: Athe, athe.
Executive: Ettavum kooduthal use cheyyunnathu desktop-ilaanalle?
Customer: Athe.
Executive: Okay. Mobile application download cheyyuka ma'am. Kurachukoodi better aayirikkum.
Customer: Aah, mobile-il use cheyyunnundallo.
Executive: Undalle? Okay.
Executive: Kooduthal nammal system aanu ma'am handle cheyyunnathu. Enganeyundu ma'am business ippo recent times-il enthengilum conversion aayaayirunno?
Customer: Aah.
Executive: Business aayaayirunno ma'am?
Customer: Eh?
Executive: Alla business enthengilum aayaayirunno ma'am?
Customer: Aah, aayaayirunnu.
Executive: Oh, super ma'am. Athu enganeyaanu ma'am? Namml atyaavashyam nalla reethiyilulla oru margin-ol aayittulla oru business aayaayirunno?
Customer: Aah, onnu nalla, kuzhappilla ennu thonnunnu.
Executive: Thonnunnu? Okay, okay, okay. Ithil ippo enganeyaanu vachu kazhinjaal ma'am ippo, ippo ma'am vilichathinte kaaranam enthaanennu vachu kazhinjaal matte enquiry varunnilla ennathullaathaanu?
Customer: Enquiry varunnundu. Pakshe chalathu enquiry varunnu. Ippo ee wifi-inte enthaanu reason ennu ariyilla. Athu notification aayittu vannilla.
Executive: Notification aayittu vannittilla?
Customer: Aah, innu raavile itta vannittundayirunnu. Pakshe ithu maathram enthaa varaathe?
Executive: Okay, athu oru minute ma'am. Enthengilum technical error aayirikkum ma'am athu varaathathinte reason. Chalappo wifi-inte enthengilum issue aayirikkum ma'am.
Executive: Aah, athe aayirikkum ma'am, aayirikkum ma'am. Ithu enquiry maathramaanu varaathe. Pinne kaaryangal enthaayille? Ee tenders undo?
Executive: Tenders?
Customer: Aah.
Executive: Tenders nammal cheyyunnundo ma'am?
Customer: Tenders enthaanu sambhavam ennu parayaathe enikku ariyilla.
Executive: Oh, athu enthaanennu vachu kazhinjaal ma'am athu government-inte oru ithaanu. Ithu enganeyaanennu vachu kazhinjaal oru, oru agreement idum. Oru aaru maasam kaalayalavu, allenkil oru varshathe kaalakaalayalavu. Inganeyulla oru kaalayalavinullil ivaru chodhikkunna quantity-il nammude side-il ninnu product supply cheyyanam. So athinu avaru huge amount namukku pay cheyyum.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: So oru varsham avaru chodhikkunna requirement ethaano athinanusarichu nammude product avarkku supply cheyyanam. Athu avaru tharunna matte time period-inullil nammal product sale cheythondirikkam. Avarkku kodukkanam. So ithu register cheyyaanaayittu nammal matte gem portal ennu paranja oru government-inte site undu. Athilu register cheyyumbothekkum namukkoru, oru number kittum. Athinte number-inte peru bid number ennaanu athinu parayunnathu. Aa number upayogichaanu nammal ee paranja tenders nammal edukkunnathu. So India Mart-il orupaadu tenders varunnundallo ma'am. Namukkippo kaanaan pattum.
Customer: Varunnundu. Orupaadu varunnundu.
Executive: Athe, athe. Tenders edukkukayaanenkil kurachukoodi better aayirikkum. Namukku turnover more than crore-inu mukalil namukku achieve cheyyaan pattum. So ithupole oru government-inte oru solid aayittulla oru tender namukku kittuvaanennundengil maybe athoru 10 to 50 crore-inu mukalil namukku earn cheyyaan pattum. Pakshe athu njaan athraykkum njaan prothsahippikkunnilla. Kaaranam athu chalappozhe kittathullu. So government-inte ithu aayathukondu thanne, athu venda. Pakshe kittum. Kittaathirikkathonnilla. Tenders edukkunnathu athrayum aalkkaar undaavathilla. Allenkil pinne government-inte official site-il aayirikkum kooduthal tenders undaavunnathu.
Executive: Entha ma'am?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Kettilla ma'am. Ma'am paranjathu kettilla. Voice break aayippoyi.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Aah, wait cheyyaam, wait cheyyaam.
(silence)
Automated Voice: Thaangal samsaarichukondirikkunna vyakthi thaangalude call hold-il vachirikkukayaan. Dayavaayi line-il thudaruka.
Automated Voice: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Automated Voice: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line...
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquiry notification not received from Wi-Fi.

- Wants to know about tenders.



Resolution:

- Informed about tenders and its benefits.

- Suggested downloading the mobile application.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- enquiry, notification, tenders, gem portal
